room_description:

Unbeknownst to him, the powers within his skateboards which allow him to half-pipe across the solar system are disrupting the Earthâ€™s magnetic field.

Find his spare board and place it in temporary safe keeping, then communicate the problem to him so he can return with a more permanent solution.
